ValidationRule.description: Referral Contact field is required on 'Will a Financial Advisor be attached to the Plan' field is YES on HRS 401k Opportunity Record Types OR HRS 401k Opportunity FSS Record Types OR Lead Source = "Referral-Financial Advisor"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR($RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity Record Type',$RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity FSS Record Type', ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,'Referral-Financial Advisor') ), Probability >=0.80, ISPICKVAL(Will_a_FA_be_attached_to_the_Plan__c, 'Yes'), ISBLANK(Referral_Contact__c) )
